zh.doc.AliyunVoice.640109-2: 通知模板结合通知配置为告警消息通知提供支撑。通知模板只能调用同一类型的通知配置服务。
zh.doc.AliyunVoice.640109-3: 使用阿里云语音时需先在阿里云语音服务平台创建语音模板。
zh.doc.AliyunVoice.640109-6: 使用固定的通知配置发送此通知模板
zh.doc.AliyunVoice.640109-8: 阿里云语音通知类型，当类型为验证码类型时可配置变量。
zh.doc.AliyunVoice.640109-10: 阿里云语音对每一条语音验证码/语音通知分配的唯一ID标识
zh.doc.AliyunVoice.640109-12: 当前仅支持国内手机号，此处若不填，则在模板调试和配置告警通知时手动填写。
zh.doc.AliyunVoice.640109-14: 用户呼叫号码显示，必须是在阿里云购买的号码。
zh.doc.AliyunVoice.640109-15: 若您使用的语音通知文件为公共模式外呼，则该参数值不填。
zh.doc.AliyunVoice.640109-16: 若您使用的语音通知文件为专属模式外呼，则必须传入已购买的号码，仅支持一个号码。
zh.doc.AliyunVoice.640109-20: 仅当通知类型为验证码类型时可进行配置，变量标识需要阿里云模板中的标识一致，支持填写带变量的动态模板。
zh.doc.AliyunVoice.640109-22: 。填写动态参数后，可对变量的名称、类型、格式进行配置，以便告警通知是填写。

en.doc.AliyunVoice.640109-2: The notification template combined with notification configuration provides support for alarm message notifications. Notification templates can only call notification configuration services of the same type.
en.doc.AliyunVoice.640109-3: When using Alibaba Cloud Voice, you need to first create a voice template on the Alibaba Cloud Voice Service Platform.
en.doc.AliyunVoice.640109-6: Send this notification template using a fixed notification configuration
en.doc.AliyunVoice.640109-8: Alibaba Cloud voice notification type, variable can be configured when the type is verification code type.
en.doc.AliyunVoice.640109-10: Alibaba Cloud Voice assigns a unique ID identifier to each voice verification code/voice notification
en.doc.AliyunVoice.640109-12: Currently, only domestic mobile phone numbers are supported. If not filled in here, it will be manually filled in during template debugging and alarm notification configuration.
en.doc.AliyunVoice.640109-14: The user's call number must be a number purchased from Alibaba Cloud.
en.doc.AliyunVoice.640109-15: If the voice notification file you are using is a public mode outbound call, do not fill in this parameter value.
en.doc.AliyunVoice.640109-16: If the voice notification file you are using is for exclusive mode outbound calling, you must provide the purchased number and only support one number.
en.doc.AliyunVoice.640109-18: Can be played up to 3 times
en.doc.AliyunVoice.640109-20: Only when the notification type is a captcha type can it be configured. Variable identification needs to be consistent with the identification in the Alibaba Cloud template, and dynamic templates with variables can be filled in.
en.doc.AliyunVoice.640109-22: After filling in the dynamic parameters, the name, type, and format of the variables can be configured for alarm notifications to be filled in.
